name: Cave Swing
description:
Falling into a cave is never fun, but things quickly change when you discover that the cave is full of diamonds!

Swing from side to side and collect as many diamonds as possible. Unlock awesome characters with unique abilities, but whatever you do, do not hit the cave walls.

How to play:
Touch and hold to swing, lift finger to release and collect diamonds.
Timing is everything.

Features:
- Unique Gameplay
- 9 Awesome Unlock-able Characters with Unique Abilities
- Bonus Mode with Mini Game
- Gorgeous Art
- Hilarious Facial Expressions and Rag-doll Animations
